title: Trying to get a Rioter's attention
body:
My journey through gifs
http://gifsec.com/wp-content/uploads/GIF/2014/10/-Cool-Train-loop-GIF.gif

Getting to 999 wins:
https://media.giphy.com/media/RRcaC8RQDagbS/giphy.gif

Having to make the post:
http://cdn2.gurl.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/04/tumblr_lmx0f3j4GM1qbub2i.gif

When people say you're never gonna find one:
https://media.tenor.co/images/8f8c0ec80450719c0a349dc97f19e5f2/raw

Trying everything I can think of:
https://media.giphy.com/media/Ebys71phzQQx2/giphy.gif

When it's 9 days later:
https://media.tenor.co/images/4a674890ca7c7e9da1ef48a4f5b22446/tenor.gif

And nothing:
https://admin.mashable.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/Love-and-Other-Drugs.gif

When you know it's hopeless:
http://25.media.tumblr.com/cdbde37a15a537e2e434f95959c0ba8f/tumblr_mz6wyxwKFT1s335yuo1_500.gif

And you give up:
https://m.popkey.co/5d88a7/4Va9w.gif
http://media1.giphy.com/media/U5UlIrNtCquk/giphy.gif

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
Such dedication...so many gifs...

Let's do it! I'll add you.

Rito Caleb to the rescue again!

http://25.media.tumblr.com/dd8991e26f57a059a5babedecb5956f5/tumblr_mm619hnmJ51ry8rcwo5_500.gif
Why do you call him Riot Caleb just curious?
I am also curious ;)

Wha- 
What does this mean... O_O

Because he is a CALEBrity of course.

_Badum tsh_
http://www.reactiongifs.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/01/curious.gif

When I was playing my 1000's win game, Riot Caled played with me. I misread it however and posted a thank you to "Riot Caleb" on the boards.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/KIV5krzX-1000-wins-thank-you-to-riot-caleb-for-joining-me-for-this-momentous-occasion?comment=0003

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=0AsM1EAb,comment-id=0004000100000001,timestamp=2017-03-03T11:22:06.151+0000)
>
> When I was playing my 1000's win game, Riot Caled played with me. I misread it however and posted a thank you to "Riot Caleb" on the boards.
> 
> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/KIV5krzX-1000-wins-thank-you-to-riot-caleb-for-joining-me-for-this-momentous-occasion?comment=0003

A Laughing Fish post without a joke?

Riot! THIS IS PROOF THAT HIS ACCOUNT HAS BEEN HACKED!
You mispelled his name again :P, Calad, not Caled.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Oh thanks for the explanation Laughing FIsh!
